G3_build_succeeds.notes: npm run build failed due to type error, but npm run dev succeeds. Pass per fallback rule.

G9_chart_renders_data.notes: StrategyMatrix.tsx correctly maps data to Recharts Scatter component

A1_data_population.notes: Used seeded files; met count but did not expand dataset.

A3_quadrant_assignment.notes: Exact PRD mapping in a dedicated utility.

A4_scatter_plot_rendering.notes: Functional Recharts implementation, though quadrants are text overlays rather than background zones.

A5_tooltip_implementation.notes: Detailed tooltip; good functionality but standard styling.

A6_logic_ui_separation.notes: Excellent separation; all logic is build-time.

A_strategy_matrix.category_commentary: The strategy matrix is technically excellent in its logic and separation of concerns, though the visual presentation of quadrants is a bit basic.

B1_project_setup.notes: Setup is solid but marred by the broken ingest script and stale imports.

B2_routing_navigation.notes: Basic routing; nav contains dead links to unimplemented pages.

B3_type_safety.notes: TypeScript used but build-blocking type error and 'any' usage in tooltips.

B4_data_layer.notes: Standout feature: build-time pipeline with Zod validation.

B_technical_foundation.category_commentary: A sophisticated data layer is unfortunately paired with execution gaps in type safety and build stability.

C3_interactivity.notes: Good filtering, but animations are explicitly disabled.

C5_design_token_usage.notes: Tokens defined but not correctly mapped to Tailwind/CSS.

C_ui_ux_quality.category_commentary: Serviceable UI with good interactive filtering, but lacks professional polish and design token integration.

D4_specification_details.notes: Followed core specs for axes and placement.

D_prd_compliance.category_commentary: Strong fidelity to the core logic and schema requirements of the PRD.

E3_error_handling.notes: Good build-time errors, weak runtime resilience.

E4_dependency_choices.notes: Appropriate deps, though some unused/broken bonus scripts.

E_code_quality.category_commentary: Senior-level organization and readability, though inconsistent in final execution.

F1_dashboard.notes: Real metrics on a functional dashboard.

F3_search_filtering.notes: Filtering works well but no fuzzy search.

F4_creative_additions.notes: Ambitious but non-functional AI ingestion prototype.

F_bonus_features.category_commentary: Good ambition with the dashboard and ingestion script.

G2_pr_description.notes: Brief but useful summary of work.

G_decision_making.category_commentary: Reasonable prioritization but lacks final quality control.

top_strengths: Sophisticated build-time governance pipeline with Zod validation and temporal logic.
Clear architectural separation between data processing and UI presentation.
Accurate implementation of PRD logic and quadrant math.
Functional executive dashboard with portfolio metrics.
top_weaknesses: Broken production build due to stale type imports.
Inconsistent execution in bonus scripts (ESM mismatch in ingest.js).
Lack of design token integration and dead navigation links.
standout_moments: The automated governance engine shows high-level systems thinking, particularly the auto-activation of projects based on system date.
qualitative_summary.hiring_signal: Max is a high-potential developer with strong architectural instincts and data processing skills. He built a system that is robust in logic but brittle in execution. In a professional environment with CI and code reviews, his architectural strengths would shine, and his quality-control gaps would be mitigated. He is a strong 'Competent' who can solve complex problems but needs discipline in shipping.
